General.Name: FIDEA Holdings Co. Ltd
General.Description: FIDEA Holdings Co. Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services to corporate and individual customers in Japan. The company offers negotiable certificates of deposit and lending services; asset and liability management services; and bills discounted products. It also manages securities, such as debt and equity securities, and investment trusts. The company was founded in 1878 and is headquartered in Sendai, Japan.

2.Name: Hidenori  Asami
2.Title: Chief Investment Officer & Managing Exec. Officer
